summary: App with Internet Identity login and a gallery; needs fixes to upload/gallery display, folders and missions creation, and splash screen behavior after login.

existing_features.title: Update the splash/intro screen UI so it displays only the gallery icon animation and does not render any welcome text (e.g., remove the "Welcome to MyGallery" heading).

Change the splash/intro triggering logic so that when a user opens/refreshes the app while already authenticated (existing Internet Identity session/delegation), the splash screen is shown once on that app load before navigating to the main Home page.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix upload so user-uploaded files and links appear in the gallery
Fix folders feature so users can create folders
Fix missions feature so users can create missions
After Internet Identity login, splash should show only the icon (no 'welcome to gallery' text) and appear every time the user opens the app while signed in

projectName: Adjust post-login splash screen to show only icon and appear on every app open while signed in
